claim: Will Ferrell worked on only Lord of the Rings.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He first established himself in the mid-1990s as a cast member on the NBC sketch comedy show Saturday Night Live , and has subsequently starred in comedy films such as Anchorman : The Legend of Ron Burgundy  (  2004  )  , Talladega Nights  (  2006  )  , Step Brothers  (  2008  )  , The Other Guys  (  2010  )  and Anchorman 2 : The Legend Continues  (  2013  )  , all but one of which he co-wrote with his comedy partner Adam McKay .
